lal16:2: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt ||
lal16:3: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṁ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai sattvaparipācanārtham ||
lal16:4: atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṁkrāmat | sā bodhisattvaṁ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma | tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṁ gacchati sma | tayāpi bodhisattvo vāsena bhaktena copanimantrito ’bhūt ||
lal16:5: tato raivatasya brahmarṣerāśramamagamat | asāvapi bodhisattvaṁ tathaivopanimantrayate sma | tathaiva rājako ’pi datṛmadaṇḍikaputro bodhisattvamupanimantrayate sma ||
lal16:6: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo ’nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṁ mahānagarīmanuprāpto ’bhut ||
lal16:7: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṁghena sārdhaṁ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ | sa śiṣyebhya ākiṁcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṁ deśayati sma | sa bodhisattvaṁ dūrata evāgacchantaṁ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma—paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti | te ’bruvan—evaṁ hyetatpaśyāmaḥ | enamativismayanīyam ||
lal16:8: tato ’haṁ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṁkramyārāḍa kālāpametadavocat—careyamahaṁ bho ārāḍe kālāpe brahmacaryam | so ’vocat—cara bho gautama tathārūpeṇa dharmākhyāne yasmin śrāddhaḥ kulaputro ’lpakṛcchreṇājñāmārādhayati ||
lal16:9: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt—asti me chando ’sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā, yannvahameko ’pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṁ tasyaiva dharmasya prāptaye sākṣātkriyāyai ||
lal16:10: atha khalvahaṁ bhikṣavo eko ’pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṁ taṁ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam ||
lal16:11: atha khalvahaṁ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṁkramyaitadavocat—etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo ’dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ? so ’vocat—evametadbho gautama | tamahamavocat—mayāpi bho eṣa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛto ’dhigataḥ | so ’vocat—tena hi bho gautama yadahaṁ dharma jānāmi, bhavānapi taṁ jānāti, yaṁ bhavān jānāti, ahamapi taṁ jānāmi | tena hyāvāmubhāvapīmaṁ śiṣyagaṇaṁ pariharāvaḥ ||
lal16:12: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṁ pūjayati sma | antevāsiṣu ca māṁ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma ||
lal16:13: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt—ayaṁ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti, tatkatarasya samyagduḥkhakṣayāya? yannvahamata uttari paryeṣamāṇaścareyam ||
lal16:14: atha khalvahaṁ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṁ vaiśālyāṁ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto ’bhūt | so ’haṁ magadheṣu caryāṁ caran yena māgadhakānāṁ rājagṛhaṁ nagaraṁ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṁkrānto ’bhūvam | tatrāhaṁ pāṇḍave parvatarājapārśve vyāhārṣamekākyadvitīyo ’sahāyo ’nekairdevakoṭinayutaśatasahasraiḥ saṁrakṣitaḥ ||
lal16:15: tato ’haṁ kalyameva saṁnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṁ mahānagaraṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṁmiñjitena prasāritena prāsādikena saṁghāṭīpaṭapātracīvaradhāraṇenāvikṣiptairindriyairabahirgatena mānasena nirmitavattailapātradharavadyugamātraṁ paśyan | tatra māṁ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan—kiṁ svidayaṁ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṁcidgiridaivatam ||
lal16:17: atha vimaladharo hyanantatejo svayamiha pravrajiyāna bodhisattvaḥ |
lal16:19: rajani vigatu jñātva bodhisattvaḥ paramasudarśaniyaṁ nivāsayitvā |
lal16:20: pātra pratigṛhīya nīcamāno praviśati rājagṛhaṁ sapiṇḍapātram ||
lal16:22: naragaṇa tatha nāri prekṣamāṇo na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena ||
lal16:23: vīthi racita ratnavastradhāryai avaśiriyā janu yāti pṛṣṭhato ’sya |
lal16:24: ko nu ayu adṛṣṭapūrvasattvo yasya prabhāya puraṁ vibhāti sarvam ||
lal16:25: upari sthihiya nāriṇāṁ sahasrā tathariva dvāri tathaiva vātayāne |
lal16:26: rathya bharita gehi śūnya kṛtvā naravaru prekṣiṣu te ananyakarmāḥ ||
lal16:27: na ca bhuyu krayavikrayaṁ karontī na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam |
lal16:28: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante puruṣavarasya nirīkṣamāṇa rūpam ||
lal16:29: puruṣa tvaritu gacchi rājagehaṁ avaciṣu rāja sa bimbisāra tuṣṭo |
lal16:30: deva parama tubhya labdha lābhā svayamiha brahma pure carāti piṇḍam ||
lal16:31: keci avaci śakra devarājo apari bhaṇanti suyāma devaputraḥ |
lal16:32: tatha api saṁtuṣitaṁ va nirmitaśca apari bhaṇanti sunirmiteṣu devaḥ ||
lal16:33: keci puna bhaṇanti candrasūryau tathapi ca rāhu baliśca vemacitrī |
lal16:34: keci puna bhaṇanti vācamevaṁ ayu so pāṇḍavaśailarājavāsī ||
lal16:35: vacanamimu śruṇitva pārthivo ’sau paramaudagramanā sthito gavākṣe |
lal16:36: prekṣati varasattva bodhisattvaṁ jvalatu śirīya sudhātukāñcanaṁ vā ||
lal16:37: piṇḍa dadiya rāja bimbisāraḥ puruṣamavocannirīkṣa kva prayātī |
lal16:38: dṛṣṭva girivaraṁ sa gacchamāno avaciṣu deva gataḥ sa śailapārśvam ||
lal16:39: rajani vigatu jñātva bimbisāro mahata janaiḥ parivārito narendraḥ |
lal16:40: upagami pāṇḍavaśailarājamūle śiriya jvalantu tamadṛśāti śailam ||
lal16:41: dharaṇi vrajitu yāni oruhitvā paramasugaurava prekṣi bodhisattvam |
lal16:42: meruriva yathā hyakampamāno nyasiya tṛṇāni niṣaṇṇa sostikena ||
lal16:43: śirasi caraṇi vandayitva rājā vividhakathāṁ samudāharitva vocat |
lal16:44: dadami tava upārdhu sarvarājyād rama iha kāmaguṇairahaṁ ca piṇḍam ||
lal16:45: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṁ dharaṇipate ciramāyu pālayasva |
lal16:46: ahamapi pravijahya rājyamiṣṭaṁ pravrajito nirapekṣi śāntihetoḥ ||
lal16:48: vipula dhana pratīccha nārisaṁghaṁ iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṁ ||
lal16:49: paramapramudito ’smi daśanātte avaciṣu sa māgadharāja bodhisattvam |
lal16:50: bhavahi mama sahāyu sarvarājyaṁ ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṁ ||
lal16:51: mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye ma bhuyu tṛṇeṣu vasāhi bhūmivāsam |
lal16:52: paramasukumāru tubhya kāyo iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṁ ||
lal16:53: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṁ akuṭila premaṇiyā hitānukampī |
lal16:54: svasti dharaṇipāla te ’stu nityaṁ na ca ahu kāmaguṇebhirarthiko ’smi ||
lal16:56: vidubhi vigarhita cāpyanārya kāmā jahita mayā yathā pakvakheṭapiṇḍam ||
lal16:57: kāma drumaphalā yathā patantī yathamiva abhrabalāhakā vrajanti |
lal16:58: adhruva capalagāmi mārutaṁ vā vikiraṇa sarvaśubhasya vañcanīyā ||
lal16:59: kāma alabhamāna dahyayante tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī |
lal16:60: yada puna avaśasya bhakṣayante tada mahaduḥkha janenti ghora kāmāḥ ||
lal16:61: kāma dharaṇipāla ye ca divyā tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā |
lal16:62: eku naru labheta sarvakāmāṁ na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan ||
lal16:63: ye tu dharaṇipāla śāntadāntā ārya anāśrava dharmapūrṇasaṁjñā |
lal16:64: prajñaviduṣa tṛpta te sutṛptā na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ ||
lal16:65: kāma dharaṇipāla sevamānā purima na vidyati koṭi saṁskṛtasya |
lal16:66: lavaṇajala yathā hi nārū pītvā bhuyu tṛṣa vardhati kāma sevamāne ||
lal16:67: api ca dharaṇipāla paśya kāyaṁ adhruvamasāraku duḥkhayantrametat |
lal16:68: navabhi vraṇamukhaiḥ sadā sravantaṁ na mama narādhipa kāmachandarāgaḥ ||
lal16:69: ahamapi vipulāṁ vijahya kāmāṁ tathapi ca istrisahasra darśanīyāṁ |
lal16:70: anabhiratu bhaveṣu nirgato ’haṁ paramaśivāṁ varabodhi prāptukāmaḥ ||
lal16:72: katama diśi kuto gato ’si bhikṣo kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā |
lal16:73: kṣatriya atha brāhmaṇo ’tha rājā parikatha bhikṣu yadī na bhārasaṁjñā ||
lal16:75: śratu ti dharaṇipāla śākiyānāṁ kapilapuraṁ paramaṁ suṛddhisphītam |
lal16:76: pitu mama śuddhodaneti nāmnā tanu ahu pravrajito guṇābhilāṣī ||
lal16:78: sādhu tava sudṛṣṭadarśanaṁ te yanu tava janma vayaṁ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ |
lal16:79: api ca mama kṣamasva āśayenā yamapi nimantritu kāmavītarāgo ||
lal16:80: yadi tvaya anuprāptu bhoti bodhiḥ tada mama seti bhoti dharmasvāmim |
lal16:81: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā mama vijite vasasīha yatsvayaṁbho ||
lal16:82: punarapi caraṇāni vandayitvā kṛtva pradakṣiṇu gauraveṇa rājā |
lal16:84: magadhapuri praveśi lokanātho vihariya śāntamanā yathābhiprāyam |
lal16:85: arthu kariya devamānuṣāṇāṁ upagami tīru nirañjanā narendraḥ ||
